title: Resolve Audio Description Track Issue
description: A visually impaired user reports that the audio description track for a TV show is silent.

tasks.description: Identify the asset and verify the presence of an audio description track.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the file should have an audio description track, but it is missing or corrupt.

tasks.description: Request a corrected file with a valid audio description track from the content provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a re-delivery request for the accessible version of the content.

tasks.description: Once received, replace the faulty file on the streaming servers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent ingests, QCs, and replaces the file, resolving the issue.
